lines.i: Distance patient fell, if injury is fall-related

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.58"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11164)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67501-7" Height of fall NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10129)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ (CONF:11165)
NEMSIS Trace: EInjury.09 Units SHOULD be in feet ('ft_i')
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11164)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67501-7" Height of fall NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10129)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ (CONF:11165)
NEMSIS Trace: EInjury.09 Units SHOULD be in feet ('ft_i')
